DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_03_01: We have no reason to fight!
DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_03_02: We just wanted to take some gold coins with us so we could have something to live on...
DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_GetOut_15_01: Get out of here now, or you'll end up like the rest of them.
DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_GetOut_03_02: Thank you! May Adanos reward you for your kindness!
DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_Sorry_15_01: Orders are orders... We're not to spare anyone.
DIA_Nizar_QA401_WAIT_Sorry_03_02: I beg you, we'll give you everything, just don't kill us!
